title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Team-Based Learning for Handball Training Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Achieve at least 80% accuracy in fundamental handball skills (passing, shooting, defensive positioning) using cooperative learning techniques
Improve game-situation judgment skills through team-based problem-solving activities
Propose at least three technical improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
Demonstrate technical analysis skills by serving as peer evaluators at least four times in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
